|exp_if_types = SFP, |exp_sfp_num = 2

|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 06/2016 |price = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device {{convert/3 |length|x|width|x|height|in|mm}} {{convert/3 |length|x|width|x|height|mm|in}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|switch}} ==Overview== ===Specifications=== *Processor: [[Realtek]] RTL8380M Multi-Layer Managed Switch :Controller with Embedded MIPS 4KEc @500MHz *Flash/RAM: 32MB (SPI NOR) Flash, 256MB RAM (DDR3L) *8x Gigabit 802.3at PoE Ethernet ports, 2x GbE SFP slots *20Gbps switching capacity, Rack mountable (1U, 19") *125W PoE budget
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:Edge-corE ECS2100-10P Top.jpeg|Board Top File:Edge-corE ECS2100-10P Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom File:Edge-corE ECS2100-10P Internal.jpeg|Internal </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
